c74object.name: tap.overdrive~
c74object.description: The tap.overdrive~ object implements a saturation effect like MSP's standard overdrive~ object, but with additional waveshaping modes.

objarg.name: numchans
objarg.description: Int argument sets the number of channels of audio to process with the filter.

attribute.name: drive
attribute.description: The drive attribute controls the amount of distortion.

attribute.name: dcblocker
attribute.description: Engage (or disengage) an internal DC blocking filter on the input signal.
